english.segment1: Yours and so much mine. By the morning, light is Thine. Perfect by design
english.segment2: Mighty to man, binding to earth. Hes sending His Son to echo His worth. Breaker of sin, winner of souls. Every creature will know
english.segment3: Our God reigns over the heavens. Over the earth, Our God reigns. Praise His name, All still standing. All that was, all that remains. Our God reigns
english.segment4: Deepest Ocean opened wide. So shall love divide. In devotion to His bride. Standing by her side
english.segment5: Mighty to man, Binding to earth. Hes sending His Son to echo His worth. Breaker of sin, winner of souls. Every creature will know
english.segment6: Our God reigns over the heavens. Over the earth, Our God reigns. Praise His name, All still standing. All that was, all that remains. Our God reigns
english.segment7: So much Holy, So divine. Yours and so much mine.
